text: This location does not have beer. (Near a school) Otherwise I like this place/location very much. Great staff! Excellent food. It does seem to me that pizza hut isn't like it used to be in general. Times change.

text: The 18 piece wings. ( $21.13 ) was cooked too  hard and crisp , I had to go home and put some water on the wings to soften the chicken. …More

name: Diana Davidson
text: This spot has awesome service and enjoyable meals. The best restaurant around here. The meals served fast and the prices are economical. Will definitely recommend this spot.

name: Michael LaRue
text: Went to the highschool across the street for years but never came here. Honestly wish I did though. Food is decent, not too overpriced, and the lady who works the counter is extremely friendly and helpful. Overall a good place.

name: Andrew Kue
text: Got two large pizza with 3 toppings each.  I can tell the pizza was made from precooked bread.  The crust was still and dried.  The worst pizza I have ever had.  To be good, pizza has to be made from fresh dough.

text: Placed a simple order of wings,bread sticks,dipping sause for the wings.  Got to the store and asked directly if we got the dipping sause for the wings and was told yes.  Got home NO SAUSE and the wings over cooked. Called back several times only to not have anyone answer. Worst  60 plus dollars ever spent. Never again.
